subject: Productivity
title: Environment Design
description: A fast breakdown of Environment Design for builders.

hook.text: Google put salad before pizza in the cafeteria line. Vegetable consumption jumped 25%.

buildup.text: Environment design changes behavior by altering cues, not by demanding more willpower.

discovery.text: Brian Wansink showed that plate size alone changes how much people eat â€” no dieting required.

twist.text: Most self-help focuses on mindset. But the strongest lever is often rearranging the physical space.

climax.text: Make good choices visible and easy. Make bad choices invisible and hard. Behavior follows design.

punchline.text: Design your space. Your habits will follow.

quiz.question: How did Google increase vegetable consumption in its cafeteria?
options: By placing salad before pizza in the line
